articles.author: Luke Harding, Dan Sabbagh
articles.title: The person to ‘weaken’ America: what the Kremlin papers said about Trump - The Guardian
articles.description: Documents appear to show how Russian intelligence worked to install their preferred candidate as president
articles.content:
RussiaThu 15 Jul 2021 18.05 BST
In January 2016, America was coming to terms with what had previously seemed incredible. Barring an unforeseen event, Donald J Trump was on course to become the Repub… [+10245 chars]
